spawn.name: The Crooked Pipe
spawn.description: A low-ceilinged goblin pub full of smoke, murmurs, and bad ideas. Nothing important happens here. At least, nothing obvious.

front_parlour.name: Front Parlour
front_parlour.description: A tidy room near the door. Words arrive here, are glanced at, and quietly passed along. No judgement is made. No action is taken.

back_parlour.name: Back Parlour
back_parlour.description: A narrow space with a watchful goblin at the door. Some are allowed to speak. Others are turned away. Nothing else happens here.

snug.name: The Snug
snug.description: A small, serious room. This is where loose language stops and intent becomes something the system can recognise.

smoking_room.name: Smoking Room
smoking_room.description: Cold, solid, and unromantic. The world is what it is here. Reasons are irrelevant. Truth is enforced.

cellar.name: The Cellar
cellar.description: Bare stone walls and stacked ledgers. Everything above rests on what is written here. Nothing here knows why it matters.

upper_landing.name: Upper Landing
upper_landing.description: Footsteps echo. Messages pass through the air. Someone might be listening. No promises are made.

quiet_booth.name: Quiet Booth
quiet_booth.description: A corner booth with old notes carved into the table. Some things reacted. Others did not. Silence is recorded either way.

ale_mug.name: Battered Ale Mug
ale_mug.description: A dented pewter mug. Still holds liquid, barely.

chalk.name: Chalk Stub
chalk.description: A worn piece of chalk. Goblins have been marking things.

guest_book.name: Guest Book
guest_book.description: A leather-bound book. Names go in. Names stay in.

key_ring.name: Key Ring
key_ring.description: A ring of small brass keys. Some doors they open. Some they don't.

dictionary.name: Battered Dictionary
dictionary.description: Words and their meanings. The meanings are not up for debate.

pipe.name: Clay Pipe
pipe.description: A simple clay pipe. Smoke rises, truth remains.

tobacco.name: Tobacco Pouch
tobacco.description: A small pouch of strong tobacco. The smell is honest.

ledger.name: Heavy Ledger
ledger.description: A thick leather ledger. Everything is written here. Nothing is erased.

ink_bottle.name: Ink Bottle
ink_bottle.description: Dark ink in a glass bottle. The records require it.

bell.name: Service Bell
bell.description: A small brass bell. Ring it and someone might hear. No guarantees.

carved_notes.name: Carved Notes
carved_notes.description: Messages carved into the table. Some are responses. Some are silence.

candle.name: Tallow Candle
candle.description: A half-burned candle. Light for those who wait.
